segments.text: How do you like the food here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't like it very much.But every-body likes their own food best .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are many things I miss . You can't get the ingredients here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you sure ? All the big cities have specialty shops , which sell all sorts of ethnic foods .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps . i just haven't had time to find them yet .
segments.speaker: S1
